directions: Combine walnuts and garlic in Oster(R) Versa(R) Performance Blender; PULSE on HIGH 2 to 3 times to chop finely.
Add remaining ingredients; select programmed DIP/SALSA setting.
If necessary PULSE on HIGH 5 to 6 times to combine.
ingredients: 1/2 cup walnut halves or pieces, toasted
title: Basil Walnut Pesto
